They found that power simply needed to be reset.  Salveo hit the start
butt=
on and the base started back to life.  The reactor began to hum
with the so=
und of power and the lights in the base turned back on.

Lord Perseus and S=
alveo left the room and Perseus locked the door
behind them.  Now that the =
power was restored he needed to get back on
the radio and answer the call.
=

On 7/29/05, rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
> "Hello, pleased to make=
 your aquaintence.  I'm Lord Perseus.  We are
> attempting to fix a small p=
ower problem, I'll radio back to you in a
> few minutes.  Perseus out."
>

so they could see what they were working with.  Hopefully this

 relatively painless repair.

move closer.  They dont' say a word.

>=

0 minutes ago.  We were trying to

rst let me know

veryone spread out.
